title: Minnesota Firm Recalls Pizza Products Due To Misbranding and Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, Sept. 27, 2013 Junction Pizza, a Grey Eagle, Minn. establishment, is recalling approximately 17,194 pounds of frozen pizza products that contain soy lecithin, a known allergen, which is not declared on the product labels, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service...
impacted_products: 30.5-ounce packages of “The Junction Pizza, Italian Sausage Thick Crust”
20-ounce packages of “The Junction Pizza, Italian Sausage Thin Crust”
